meanings.definition: Of or relating to the pineal gland.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the pineal gland is a small, important part of the brain.
meanings.sent2: The pineal gland helps regulate sleep patterns in the body.
meanings.sent3: I like to imagine my pineal gland as a tiny, magical sleep wizard.
meanings.sent4: Her pineal gland seemed to glow with a mysterious energy.
meanings.sent5: The pineal gland is like a tiny nightlight inside your brain.

meanings.definition: Resembling a pine cone in shape.
meanings.sent1: The pineal decoration on the table looked like a small, pointed pine cone.
meanings.sent2: The pineal ornament added a natural touch to the room.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally stepped on the pineal decoration, thinking it was a real pine cone!
meanings.sent4: The pineal shape of the ornament reminded me of a miniature forest.
meanings.sent5: The pineal design of the ornament was both elegant and rustic.
